nav.div: Bristol Township School District » Departments » Health Services » COVID 19 Resources

span.style: font-size: medium; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Bristol Township School District has been working daily on the Coronavirus concerns including:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Communication with County and State Agencies.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Monitoring recommendations of Local, State and National Heath Organizations.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Planning for a number of potential scenarios in the future.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 10pt; text-align: left;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span:
Increasing efforts to keep our schools clean.
How you can help: You can help by recognizing the importance of keeping your child home when they have a fever. Children should not return to school until they have been fever free without medication for 24 hours.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Below please find educational resources related to the Coronavirus.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Informational pieces for you and your family if you choose to view them.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Coronavirus Brain Pop (Grades 4 through 12; 3:47 in length) -
